title: Rbanism
text:
Rbanism   Community 



Our mission is to build capacity, competence, and confidence for working with data and research software in the urbanism research community at large.

   Join the next event

title: Rbanism
text:
Events
The Rbanism community aims to empower urbanism researchers, students, educators and practitioners to use open-source software and related open-science practices effectively and with confidence.














Scalable GIS for Urbanists Workshop


May 22, 2023, 9:00 AM–5:00 PM, Blue Room, TU Delft Library


Experience the infrastructure and workflows of large-scale GIS applications relevant for urbanism research.













Reproducibility Wrap-up Event


Apr. 10, 2023, 3:00-4:30 PM


A celebratory closing to our first series of events.













Reproducibility Challenge


Oct. 26, 2022–Jan. 26, 2023


Find out how reproducible your research is.

title: Rbanism
text:
Join the Rbanism Community!
Sign up to join the Rbanism community and stay up to date with our events, activities and resources. Please note that we expect all members of the community to follow our Code of Conduct.
